elements: I have a position in the chorus at the Gaiety. It's mine until my luck or my looks run out... or until I find something better.
A Contract at the Gaiety: Suspended
Sometimes I spend time with my benefactor, and sometimes my benefactor gives me gifts.
My benefactor has grown more attentive, and more jealous of my time.
These days, my benefactor requires my full attention, but I am well looked after.
In a moment of passion, my benefactor has proposed marriage. If I accept, this will transform my life... and close other doors forever.
A Contract at the Ecdysis Club
I perform at the Ecdysis Club, on the nights when it's open.
A Superior Contract at the Ecdysis Club
I perform the more exacting dances at the Ecdysis Club.
A Particular Arrangement with the Ecdysis Club
I am occasionally paid a generous consideration to perform very specific dances for very particular connoisseurs.
